text:
Employees engaged in
manufacturing, selling, transporting, and delivering ice used to refrigerate
interstate shipments are subject to the FLSA. It is not material that the ice
may be consumed before the interstate movement is accomplished.
html: Employees engaged in manufacturing, selling, transporting, and delivering ice used to refrigerate interstate shipments are subject to the FLSA. It is not material that the ice may be consumed before the interstate movement is accomplished.
